attributes.additional_details: The Secretary of State claims that the current funding model prevents Channel 4 from competing with paid streaming services. This is not what Channel 4 is for. Channel 4 fulfils an important public service remit that isn’t met elsewhere. This is cultural vandalism of the highest order.
attributes.background: Immediately halt the proposal to privatise Channel 4. The channel is profitable and supports independent production companies and nurtures new talent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
